entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 4:24PM AKDT by NWS

entry.title: Flash Flood Warning issued September 28 at 7:09PM MST until September 28 at 8:30PM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN MOHAVE COUNTY... At 709 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms had dissipated over Golden Valley and the area north of Chloride. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain was estimated to have fallen from the earlier storms. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 10:45PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Increased Fire Danger through Thursday... Strong Canadian high pressure will remain north of the area through Thursday as Hurricane Ian continues slowly marching northward from Florida. The tight surface pressure gradient between these systems will result in strong and gusty northeasterly winds.
